parameters.subject: ‚è∞ Your FitLife Membership is Expiring Soon!
parameters.message:
=

‚è∞ Membership Renewal Reminder

Don't let your fitness journey stop!

Hi {{ $json['First Name'] }}!

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice:

Your {{ $json['Membership Type'] }} membership will expire on {{ DateTime.fromISO($json['Expiry Date']).toFormat('MMMM dd, yyyy') }}

That's only {{ Math.ceil(DateTime.fromISO($json['Expiry Date']).diffNow('days').days) }} days from now!

üéÅ EXCLUSIVE RENEWAL OFFER!

Save 20% on Early Renewal

Renew before {{ DateTime.fromISO($json['Expiry Date']).minus({ days: 7 }).toFormat('MMMM dd') }} and get:

  • 20% discount on your next period
  • Free personal training session
  • Complimentary body composition analysis
  • Priority class booking for 3 months

üìä Your Membership Summary:

  • Member Since: {{ DateTime.fromISO($json['Start Date']).toFormat('MMMM dd, yyyy') }}
  • Current Plan: {{ $json['Membership Type'] }}
  • Member ID: {{ $json['Member ID'] }}
Renew Now & Save 20% Explore Upgrade Options

Questions? Call us at (555) 123-4567 or reply to this email.
Unsubscribe from reminders

parameters.subject: üìÖ Your Fitness Assessment is Booked!
parameters.message:
=

Fitness Assessment Confirmed!

Hi {{ $json['First Name'] }},

Your complimentary fitness assessment has been scheduled!

Check your email for the Google Calendar invite with all the details.

  • Date: {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.Date).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy') }}
  • Time: {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.Date).toFormat('hh:mm a') }}
  • Duration: 60 minutes
  • Location: FitLife Gym - Main Floor

What to bring:

  • Comfortable workout clothes
  • Athletic shoes
  • Water bottle
  • Towel

View in Google Calendar
